item-name.description: The name or title of the item

open-date.description: Date and time when the listing was opened

image-url.description: URL of the main image of the item

item-is-marketplace.description: Indicates if the item belongs to the marketplace

product-id-type.description: Type of identifier used for the product

item-note.description: Any additional notes related to the item

will-ship-internationally.description: Indicates whether international shipping is supported

expedited-shipping.description: Indicates whether expedited shipping is available

zshop-boldface.description: Indicates if the listing is in boldface

add-delete.description: Indicates whether to add or delete the listing

fulfillment-channel.description: The channel through which fulfillment will be handled

Business Price.description: The price of the item for business customers

Quantity Price Type.description: The type of pricing for quantity pricing tiers

Quantity Lower Bound 1.description: The lower bound value for quantity pricing tier 1

Quantity Price 1.description: The price for quantity pricing tier 1

Quantity Lower Bound 2.description: The lower bound value for quantity pricing tier 2

Quantity Price 2.description: The price for quantity pricing tier 2

Quantity Lower Bound 3.description: The lower bound value for quantity pricing tier 3

Quantity Price 3.description: The price for quantity pricing tier 3

Quantity Lower Bound 4.description: The lower bound value for quantity pricing tier 4

Quantity Price 4.description: The price for quantity pricing tier 4

Quantity Lower Bound 5.description: The lower bound value for quantity pricing tier 5

Quantity Price 5.description: The price for quantity pricing tier 5

merchant-shipping-group.description: Shipping group associated with the merchant

Progressive Price Type.description: The type of pricing for progressive pricing tiers

Progressive Lower Bound 1.description: The lower bound value for progressive pricing tier 1

Progressive Price 1.description: The price for progressive pricing tier 1

Progressive Lower Bound 2.description: The lower bound value for progressive pricing tier 2

Progressive Price 2.description: The price for progressive pricing tier 2

Progressive Lower Bound 3.description: The lower bound value for progressive pricing tier 3

Progressive Price 3.description: The price for progressive pricing tier 3

dataEndTime.description: End time for the listing data
